dns-equal

Compare DNS record strings for equality. Enforces RFC 1035 domain comparison.

Installation

npm install dns-equal --save

Usage

```js var dnsEqual = require(‘dns-equal’)

var domain1 = ‘Example.COM’ var domain2 = ‘example.com’

if (dnsEqual(domain1, domain2)) { console.log(‘The two domains are the same’) } ```
